## Discover Routing
Explore the power of choosing the right LLM for your needs and how to optimize for quality, speed, and cost-efficiency.

## Faster, Cheaper andBetter Performance

## Voices of Support
## Voices of Support
Testimonials from our users, backers and community.
"Transparent LLM benchmarks are very much needed, and Unify’s live dashboards are a useful resource for everyone."
![samsung next logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/662f6a390b6846bc2e6afc7c_huggingface.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/662f69d3cce2e8f3bdb3766f_clem_delangue.png)
Clem Delangue
CEO, Hugging face
"The LLM and GenAI space has become incredibly non-transparent with costs getting out of control. Unify is the one-stop-shop for quickly comparing all of the latest models and providers objectively."
![Essence VS logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/662f7228400177d1686fc299_googledeepmind_logo.jpeg)
![Timothy Chen](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/662f721b73b4e98b67ec64e3_lasse-espeholt.jpeg)
Lasse Espeholt
Staff Research Scientist, deepmind
"When deploying new AI features for the Awin platform, which serves over 30,000 brands and 250,000 active partners, model diversity, evaluation benchmarks and performance optimization are vital. There is a constant stream of new LLMs with new capabilities every week, each becoming increasingly specialized. Routing across the entire LLM landscape could result in much higher quality than any one model, and Unify is therefore perfectly positioned to create a lot of value."
![Sentinel One Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/6639e37268e8afabda74ff6a_AWIN-logo-1.png)
![Alex Krongold](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/6639e36586af75937754d6c3_james-bentley.jpeg)
James Bentley
AI and Strategy Director, Awin
"Agentic RAG systems often involve dozens of sequential LLM calls, making speed and cost evermore important. Unify is perfectly positioned to address this, by intelligently routing to faster and cheaper models where possible. If they get things right, they could become an integral part of the LLM stack."
![Wefunder logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/662f71d329fe9fb1d2aea6cc_weaviate_io_logo.jpeg)
![Mattia Astori](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/662f71c8d27f895f8c3171ab_bob.jpeg)
Bob van Luijt
CEO, weaviate
"Every new LLM claims to have the best performance on benchmarks, and every new provider claims to be the fastest and cheapest. Unify puts these claims to the test in an unbiased manner, on a central platform. Don’t take the models and providers at their word, just train a Unify router on your own data and see for yourself which combination is best."
![Abstraction Capital logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/662f72a27db6857870a494d7_dropbox_logo.jpeg)
![Taylor Clauson](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/662f7296678028a9e1bf88d4_arash.jpeg)
Arash Ferdowsi
Co-founder, dropbox
"As the LLM landscape continues to expand, solid and impartial developer tools are needed to ensure everyone is able to build high-performance applications. Unify is an integral part of this stack, giving a lot of flexibility to developers with little overheads."
![A Capital](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/662f6fe735977f132aaf639c_ToolsforHumanity.jpeg)
![Ramu Arunachalam](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/662f6fdb17c9d2f0f442fc97_saturnin-pugnet.jpeg)
Saturnin Pugnet
founding member, tools for humanity
"New language models keep on coming; and techniques like fine-tuning, RAG, and GraphRAG add near-endless possibilities for literally each GenAI application call. Unify.ai simplifies and automates an optimization problem that is both daunting and universal, giving AI engineers visibility and control over cost, accuracy, and speed."
![A Capital](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/664d96040dbb41b7c6529f05_neo4j_logo_globe.png)
![Ramu Arunachalam](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/664d95f9213049faeaf1ff4c_philipratle.webp)
Philip Rathle
CTO at Neo4j
"One of the biggest challenges enterprise developers face in building production LLM applications (whether it's RAG or a complex agent workflow) is figuring out how to optimize it for better accuracy, cost, and speed. There are too many parameters to tune and it quickly becomes an intractable mess of trying out different hyperparameter values. Unify significantly reduces that complexity by optimizing the LLM selection, letting developers spend more time on critical application logic."
![A Capital](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/664d9dca75695f799365baaa_1681327675102.jpeg)
![Ramu Arunachalam](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/664d9d9331d08fda7edbf5cd_jerry.jpeg)
Jerry Liu
Ceo at LlamaIndex
"Trying to keep up with all new LLMs and providers is impossible, Unify makes it easy to cut through all the noise and ensure the best LLM is always being used."
![Abstraction Capital logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/662f726935977f132ab167f4_voi_technology_logo.jpeg)
![Taylor Clauson](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/643fb31f2ef62cf324fab8ca/662f725ee5a7ad508558fd5f_frederik-hjelm.jpeg)
Fredrik Hjelm
CEO, voi

"When deploying new AI features for the Awin platform, which serves over 30,000 brands and 250,000 active partners, model diversity, evaluation benchmarks and performance optimization are vital. generated_description:
### Overview of Unify

**Name:** Unify  
**Founded:** 2022  
**Location:** London, United Kingdom  
**Team Size:** 10 employees  
**Funding:** Recently announced an **$8 million funding round**  
**Affiliation:** Y Combinator Batch W23  

**Website:** [unify.ai](https://unify.ai)  
**Mission:** Take back control of your LLM (Large Language Model) 🌟

### The Problem They Solve

Unify emerged in a landscape where LLMs were becoming too complex and unwieldy in production. Their goal? To help users regain control. The platform allows developers to build custom evaluations, iterate quickly, and transition from prototypes to production seamlessly.

### What They Offer

Unify provides a unified API that aggregates multiple LLMs, allowing users to combine models for faster, cheaper, and better responses than relying on a single model. With a focus on simplicity, it enables users to construct workflows in seconds. This makes it ideal for developers who are overwhelmed by the myriad of tools and options available.

Key Features:
- **One API for all models**: Interact with various models from different providers through a single API key.
- **Performance optimization**: Personalize responses based on speed, quality, and cost requirements.
- **Transparent benchmarks**: Real-time dashboards help users assess which LLM performs best for their tasks.

### Who Trusts Unify

Their technology is already being utilized by notable engineering teams at companies like DeepMind, Amazon, Tesla, Twitter (X), and Salesforce. This endorsement speaks volumes about its credibility and effectiveness.

### Community and Partners

Unify has garnered support from several prominent VCs and angel investors. Their strong backing showcases confidence in the company's potential to simplify the LLM landscape and provide valuable tools for developers.

### Conclusion

If you're a developer grappling with the complexities of deploying large language models, Unify is worth a look. Their approach combines ease of use with robust functionality, aiming to streamline your workflow in a way that feels intuitive and effective. The idea of having a single point of contact for diverse LLMs is compelling, especially when navigating the evolving tech landscape. 

For more details, check out their offerings at [Unify](https://unify.ai), or dive straight into the console to try it out for yourself!
